means: 使烦恼( vex的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: It vexed me to think of others gossiping behind my back.
sentence.Network_cn: 一想到别人在背后说我闲话，我就很恼火。

sentence.Network_en: Later Mr Moi raised the vexed question of refugees.
sentence.Network_cn: 后来莫伊先生提出了那个让人头疼的难民问题。

sentence.Network_en: Exporters, farmers and industrialists alike are vexed and blame the government.
sentence.Network_cn: 出口商、农场主和实业家们都很恼火，纷纷谴责政府。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《冤家搭档》（Vexed）和《新编福尔摩斯》一样，这部带有轻喜剧色彩的警匪剧讲述Jack和Kate这对侦探搭档共同破案的故事－－ …
苦字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 苦难〖 pain;sufferings;misery〗 苦恼〖 distressed;vexed;worried〗 苦情〖 plight〗.
vexed question 难题vexed 为难的vexedly 着急地
烦的意思,烦怎么读_在线字典 ... 烦琐哲学〖 scholasticism〗 烦心〖 vexed〗 烦厌〖 betiredof〗.

list.abs: Character  - Chinese Character... ... 窝缩[ roll up] 窝心[ feel vexed;feel irritated] 窝赃[ harbour stolen goods].
vexatiously 厌烦地vexed question 难题vexed 为难的
veto 否决vex oneself 独自烦恼vex 使烦恼
百度词典搜索_心 ... 心毒[ cruel] 心烦[ fuss;be perturbed;be vexed] 心房[ auricle;atrium].

entry.tran: 令人烦恼的;伤脑筋的;棘手的
entry.def: A vexed problem or question is very difficult and causes people a lot of trouble.

example.ex: Ministers have begun work on the vexed issue of economic union...
example.tran: 部长们开始着手处理经济联盟这个棘手的问题。

example.ex: Later Mr Moi raised the vexed question of refugees.
example.tran: 后来莫伊先生提出了那个让人头疼的难民问题。

means.word_mean: 1. troubled persistently especially with petty annoyances;

sentences.sentence: "her poor pestered father had to endure her constant interruptions"
"the vexed parents of an unruly teenager"

means.word_mean: 2. causing difficulty in finding an answer or solution; much disputed;

sentences.sentence: "we live in vexed and troubled times"

auth_sentence.content: Gosse was extremely vexed and sorry about his mistake.
auth_sentence.res_content: Gosse was extremely vexed and sorry about his mistake.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Gosse was extremely vexed and sorry about his mistake.

auth_sentence.content: I must write home or mother will be vexed.
auth_sentence.res_content: I must write home or mother will be vexed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I must write home or mother will be vexed.

auth_sentence.content: Of course you're vexed at my interfering with you.
auth_sentence.res_content: Of course you're vexed at my interfering with you.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Of course you're vexed at my interfering with you.

means.word_mean: 争论不休的问题； 棘手的问题

sentences.en: They’re discussing the vexed question of private health insurance.
sentences.cn: 他们正在讨论个人健康保险这个总让人争论不休的问题。
